active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate how ongoing staff security awareness reinforcement addresses human risks (e.g., phishing, social engineering) in the context of the Defense-in-Depth People pillar. Use Verizon DBIR data (74% breaches from human error) and NIST SP 800-50 to support arguments on why management responsibilities are critical for compliance (GDPR, HIPAA). Identify prerequisites like basic threat knowledge and propose one improvement.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

distractor_protocol.step: Identify common misconceptions about the topic
Ensure distractors are similar in length and complexity
Include partial truths that require deeper understanding
